io.codecastle.scriptorium

Interface FluentAppendable<THIS extends FluentAppendable<THIS>>

  • Type Parameters:
    THIS - this type
    All Superinterfaces:
    Appendable

    public interface FluentAppendable<THIS extends FluentAppendable<THIS>>
extends Appendable
    An extension of Appendable that uses a recursive type parameter for improved fluency.
